text:
szAppName : Apache.exe     szAppVer : 2.0.47.0     szModName : libhttpd.dll
szModVer : 2.0.47.0     offset : 0001afd4     

The crash was catched by Win XP drwatson crash report tool.
Unfortunately no more info about it.
creator: webmaster33@bigfoot.com

text: Is this reproducible at all? Dr. Watson tends to be on the erratic side.
creator: Kristian.Bergmann@nvg.org

text: It happened several times, but not found yet a way to reproduce it.
creator: webmaster33@bigfoot.com
webmaster33@bigfoot.com
text:
I was forced to upgrade from Apache v1.3.28 to v2.0.47 because of the bug 23460.
But now I have to face that v2.0.47 is not stable enough (at least on Windows).

If bug 23460 would be fixed on v1.3.28, I would downgrade back to the stable
v1.3.28.

Please submit backtrace / way to reproduce the crash, it will help in
reproducing and fixing the problem.

Thanks you.
creator: amit_athavale@lycos.com

text: Old version and not enough info to debug.  Marking invalid.
creator: slive@apache.org
